Module.name: BtofGeo8
Module.comment: is the Geometry of Barrel Trigger / Time Of Flight system
Module.Content: BTOF,BTOH,BSEC,BTRA,BUND,BTFT,BASE, BARM,BANG,BWAT,BCOV,BXTR,BMTC,BTTC, BMAA,BMTD,BASS,BXSA,BCSB,BCCV,BFEE, BLEM,BCPM,BCSK,BTSK,BZEL,BCEL,BCEB, BCON,BPLA,BCOO,BRAI,BPIP,BPIQ,BRTC, BRMD,BRHC,BRCB,BRNY,BRGR,BROG,BRDT, BRSG,BRIG,BRWG,BRFE,BUPC,BTFE,BGMT, GMTS,GSBX,GSBY,GSBZ,GNSF,GSBB,GINO, GSBE,GFBO,GHVB,GVBC,GFBC,GEMG,GEMS, GAPV

var.name: Z0
var.comment: z distance of tray edge to TPC centralplane (previous TrayEdgeZ moved here)

var.name: posit1
var.comment: TOFp tray position (0) choice 4 or 5 -> run-2,3 posn

var.name: posit2
var.comment: TOFr tray position for choice 5 -> run-4 posn

var.name: posit3
var.comment: TOFr tray position for choice 8,9,10 -> run-5,6,7 posn

var.name: posit4
var.comment: TOFr8 tray positions for choice 11,12 -> run 8 east and west trays

var.name: StripT
var.comment: Thickness of polyethylene strip on bottom

var.name: Foot1len
var.comment: length (in section) of first part of foot

var.name: Foot3Len
var.comment: length of third part of foot

var.name: TopThk
var.comment: thickness of the tray top (not the WallThk)

var.name: CoverH
var.comment: cover height (from tray top to cover top)

var.name: FEEH1
var.comment: distance of TINO/TCPU to tray top

var.name: FEEH2
var.comment: distance of TDIG/TTRG to tray top

var.name: FEEH1
var.comment: distance of GINO to tray top

var.name: FEEHz
var.comment: distance of GINO to tray side

var.name: FEEHy
var.comment: distance of GINO to tray front

var.name: GINThkd
var.comment: is to the center of the GINO board from the center of GMTS

var.name: GNFThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the gas seal flange

var.name: GNSFThkd
var.comment: is to the center of the gas seal flange from the center of GMTS

var.name: GSBEThkd
var.comment: is to the center of the empty space inside of the bonnet from the center of GMTS

var.name: GNFL
var.comment: is the length of the gas seal flange

var.name: GNFW
var.comment: is the width of the gas seal flange

var.name: GSBLb
var.comment: is the length of the gas seal bonnet base

var.name: GSBWb
var.comment: is the width of the gas seal bonnet base

var.name: GSBThkb
var.comment: is the thickness of the gas seal bonnet base

var.name: GSBBThkd
var.comment: is the center of the gas seal bonnet base from the center of GMTS

var.name: GSBL
var.comment: is the length of the empty space in the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSBW
var.comment: is the width of the empty space in the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSBThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the empty space in the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the gas seal bonnet cover top

var.name: GSBTL
var.comment: is the length of the gas seal bonnet cover top

var.name: GSBTW
var.comment: is the width of the gas seal bonnet cover top

var.name: GSBSL
var.comment: is the length of the side of the gas seal bonnet wrt (axis)

var.name: GSBThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the gas seal bonnet sides from the center of GMTS

var.name: GHVBThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the high voltage box from the center of GMTS

var.name: GSBTThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the gas seal bonnet top from the center of GMTS

var.name: GSBSW
var.comment: is the width of the side of the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSBFBL
var.comment: is the length of the back and front of the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSBFBW
var.comment: is the width of the back and front of the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSBFBThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the back and front of the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GSBSThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the side of the gas seal bonnet

var.name: GEML
var.comment: is the length of the GEM

var.name: GEMW
var.comment: is the width of the GEM

var.name: GEMThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the GEM

var.name: GEMGL
var.comment: is the length of the volume of gas in the GEM

var.name: GEMGW
var.comment: is the width of the volume of gas in the GEM

var.name: GEMGThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the volume of gas in the GEM- .04

var.name: GEMGThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the GEM gas from the center of GSBE

var.name: GEMThka
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the first GEM foil- cathode plane from the center of the GSBE

var.name: GEMThkb
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the second GEM foil from the center of the GSBE

var.name: GEMThkc
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the third GEM foil from the center of the GSBE

var.name: GEMThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the fourth GEM foil from the center of the GSBE

var.name: APVThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the APV from the center of the GSBE

var.name: HVThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the HV Box

var.name: HVW
var.comment: is the width of the HV Box

var.name: GtoHVW
var.comment: is the distance from the center of the GINO board to the closest end of the HV Box

var.name: HVL
var.comment: is the length of the HV Box

var.name: GtoHVL
var.comment: is the length from the center of the GINO board to the closest end of the HV Box

var.name: GBL
var.comment: is the length of the gas box

var.name: GBW
var.comment: is the width of the gas box

var.name: GBThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the gas box

var.name: GBThkd
var.comment: is the distance to the center of the Gas Box from the center of GMTS

var.name: GtoGFW
var.comment: is the distance from the center of the GINO board to the closest end of the gas boxes

var.name: GtoGFL
var.comment: is the length from the center of the GINO board to the farthest end of the front gas box

var.name: GtoGBL
var.comment: is the length from the center of the GINO board to the closest end of the back gas box

var.name: GVL
var.comment: is the length of the connector for the HV box

var.name: GVI
var.comment: is the inner radius of the connector for the HV box

var.name: GVO
var.comment: is the outer radius of the connector for the HV box

var.name: GCL
var.comment: is the length of the connector for the gas box

var.name: GCO
var.comment: is the outer radius of the connector for the gas box

var.name: GCI
var.comment: is the inner radius of the connector for the gas box

var.name: GtoAPVL
var.comment: is the distance from the center of the GINO board to the APV

var.name: APVL
var.comment: is the length of the APV

var.name: APVW
var.comment: is the width of the APV

var.name: APVThk
var.comment: is the thickness of the APV

var.name: Shim
var.comment: thickness of shim to position slat 2

var.name: ElecHgt
var.comment: FEE Board height in tray... (rails/loop too).

var.name: BconYLen
var.comment: BCON Y length for TOFp Slat assembly

var.name: BconZLen
var.comment: BCON Z length for TOFp Slat assembly

var.name: BLEMPosX
var.comment: BLEM position X in BFEE = ElecThck + 0.7/2.0

Fill.name: MODR
Fill.comment: RUN3 MRPC TOF Module dimensions and positions

var.name: X0Offset
var.comment: Tray inner surface to the center

var.name: HBWid
var.comment: the slim honeycomb support box width

Fill.name: MOD4
Fill.comment: RUN4 MRPC TOF Module dimensions and positions

var.name: X0Offset
var.comment: Tray inner surface to the center

var.name: HBWid
var.comment: the slim honeycomb support box width

var.name: TrayEdgeZ
var.comment: tray posn along rail wrt TPC centerplane (Z)

Fill.name: MOD5
Fill.comment: RUN5 MRPC TOF Module dimensions and positions

var.name: X0Offset
var.comment: Tray inner surface to the center - new value from Jing

var.name: HBWid
var.comment: the slim honeycomb support box width

var.name: TrayEdgeZ
var.comment: tray posn along rail wrt TPC centerplane (Z).Liuj puts this new value

Fill.name: MOD7
Fill.comment: RUN7++ MRPC TOF Module dimensions and positions

var.name: X0Offset
var.comment: Tray inner surface to the center -tray_Height/2+tray_WallThk

var.name: HBWid
var.comment: the slim honeycomb support box width

var.name: TrayEdgeZ
var.comment: tray posn along rail wrt TPC centerplane

Block.name: BTOF
Block.comment: is the whole CTF system envelope

Module.Block:
btog_choice,8
YEAR
choice = 1 ! ctb
choice= 2 ! full tofp
choice= 6 ! full tofr
choice=12 ! run-9 selection (west)
choice=13 ! run-13 selection (west)
choice
choice = btog_choice
choice=-btog_choice ! explicitly handle East Barrel (runs 9 and 13+)
choice

Block.name: BTOH
Block.comment: is a half of trigger system (west-east)
Block.Do:
tof=0 !// all CTB for choice=1
tof=1 !// all TOFp
tof=1 !// big TOFp patch, rest CTB
tof=1 !// Run-2 (one TOFp tray)
tof=1 !// Run-3 (one TOFp tray
tof=2 ! and one TOFr tray)
tof=7 !// all TOFr
tof=1 !// Run-4 (one TOFp tray moved 1 slot
tof=3 ! and one TOFrp tray)
tof=4 !// Run-5 (one TOFr5 tray)
tof=5 !// Run-6 (one TOFr6 tray)
tof=6 !// Run-7 (one TOFr7 tray)
tof=7 !// Run-8 (5 TOFr8 trays)
tof=7 !// Run-8 (5 TOFr8 trays)
tof=7 !// Run-8 (5 TOFr8 trays)
tof=7 !// Run-8 (5 TOFr8 trays)
tof=7 !// Run-8 (5 TOFr8 trays)
tof= 7 !// Run-9:TOFr8 tray (west)
tof=-1 !// Run-9: no tray (west)
tof= 7 !// Run-9: TOFr8 tray (east)
tof=-1 !// Run-9: no tray (east)
tof= btog_posit13(is) !// Run-13+ (west)
tof= btog_posit13(is+60) !// Run-13+ (east)

Block.name: BSEC
Block.comment: is a sector of CTB/TOF Trigger Barrel Scintillators

Block.name: BTRA
Block.comment: is one full tray plus supporting structure for CTB/TOF

Block.name: BRFE
Block.comment: is the FEE of tofr (run-3)

Block.name: BXTR
Block.comment: is a Main TRay covering box for CTB or TOF

Block.name: BMTC
Block.comment: is the Main Tray Cavity filled with the details for CTB

Module.Block:
zpos = (tray_length-ctbb_Slab1Len)/2-tray_WallThk-ctbb_Wrap xpos = -tray_Height/2+ctbb_Slab1x
zpos = zpos - (ctbb_Slab1Len + ctbb_ConvLen)/2
zpos = zpos - (ctbb_ConvLen + ctbb_PmtLen)/2
zpos = zpos - (ctbb_PmtLen + ctbb_BaseLen)/2
zpos = (tray_length-ctbb_Slab2Len)/2-tray_WallThk-ctbb_Wrap-ctbb_Shim xpos = -tray_Height/2+ctbb_Slab2x
zpos = zpos - (ctbb_Slab2len + ctbb_ConvLen)/2
zpos = zpos - (ctbb_ConvLen + ctbb_PmtLen)/2
zpos = zpos - (ctbb_PmtLen + ctbb_BaseLen)/2

Block.name: BTTC
Block.comment: is the Main Tray Cavity filled with the details for TOFp

Block.name: BUPC
Block.comment: is the upper cover of tofr

Block.name: BTFE
Block.comment: is the TINO/TDIG boards

Block.name: BRTC
Block.comment: is the Main Tray Cavity filled with the details for TOFr (run3 or run4)

Block.name: BGMT
Block.comment: is the mixture gas box in tray that change the hc box into slim
Block.If:
z0 = tray_Length/2 - 0.05 x0 = modr_X0Offset
z0 = tray_Length/2 - 0.05 - mod4_TrayEdgeZ x0 = mod4_X0Offset
z0 = tray_Length/2 - 0.05 - mod5_TrayEdgeZ x0 = mod5_X0Offset
z0 = tray_Length/2 - mod7_TrayEdgeZ x0 = -tray_Height/2 + tray_WallThk
z0 = tray_Length/2 - tray_WallThk x0 = -(tray_Height-tray_CoverH-tray_WallThk-tray_TopThk)/2
z0 = tray_Length/2 - tray_WallThk x0 = -(tray_Height-tray_CoverH-tray_WallThk-tray_TopThk)/2

Block.name: BMAA
Block.comment: is a b1ox for a 4wide AND 5wide phi column of TOF Scintillators

Block.name: BMTD
Block.comment: is a 5wide phi column of TOF Scintillators

Block.name: BASS
Block.comment: is a single TOF Slat Assembly (slat+PMT+base)

Module.Block:
totlen = toff_SlatLen+toff_PmtLen+toff_BaseLen
zpos = -(totlen-toff_SlatLen)/2
zpos = zpos + (toff_SlatLen+toff_PmtLen)/2
zpos = zpos + toff_PmtLen/2.
zpos = zpos + toff_BaseLen/2
zpos = zpos + toff_BaseLen/2 - 0.6

Block.name: BXSA
Block.comment: is the active trigger scintillator SLAB for ctb

Block.name: BCSB
Block.comment: is the active trigger scintillator SLAB for tof

Block.name: BCCV
Block.comment: is a Ctb optical ConVerter

Block.name: BCSK
Block.comment: is a CTB Linear Base tube

Block.name: BZEL
Block.comment: is a Ctb PM electronics

Block.name: BCPM
Block.comment: is a PhotoMultiplier Tube (same for CTB and TOF)

Block.name: BTSK
Block.comment: is the outer shell of a TOF CW Base

Block.name: BCEL
Block.comment: is a circular G10 board in the CW Base for TOF

Block.name: BCEB
Block.comment: is a square G10 board in the CW Base for TOF

Block.name: BPLA
Block.comment: is the plastic angle pieces that hold the upper foam supports...

Block.name: BCON
Block.comment: is a generic plastic block for various connectors, foam-support-angles, etc......

Block.name: BFEE
Block.comment: is a G10 FrontEndElectronics board for TOF

Block.name: BLEM
Block.comment: is a Lemo connector on the FEE boards

Block.name: BCOO
Block.comment: are the cooling rails/loops

Block.name: BRAI
Block.comment: is the Rail for the cooling loop

Block.name: BPIP
Block.comment: is the Long Pipe for the cooling loop

Block.name: BPIQ
Block.comment: is the Short Pipe for the cooling loop

Block.name: BUND
Block.comment: is Undercarriage support tray - same both for CTB and TOF

Module.Block:
xpos = (tray_SupFullH - tray_FootThk)/2 ypos = (tray_width - tray_Foot1Len)/2 - tray_FootInse
xpos = (tray_SupFullH - tray_Foot2Thk)/2 ypos = ypos - (tray_Foot1Len + tray_FootThk)/2
xpos = (tray_SupFullH - tray_FootThk)/2 - tray_Foot2Thk ypos = ypos - (tray_FootThk + tray_Foot3Len)/2
support_aile_width = ( tray_SupFullH-tray_SupArmT )/tan(60*DegRad) support_arm_width = ( tray_SupFullW-tray_SupBaseW)/2-support_aile_width support_aile_Ypos = ( tray_SupBaseW+Support_Aile_width)/2 support_arm_Xpos = ( tray_SupFullH-tray_SupArmT )/2 support_arm_Ypos = ( tray_SupFullW-Support_Arm_width)/2

Block.name: BTFT
Block.comment: is the Foot structure ( Material Aluminium )

Block.name: BARM
Block.comment: is a TPC cooling structure arm ( Material Aluminium )

Block.name: BANG
Block.comment: is an angled part of TPC cooling structure ( Aile )

Block.name: BASE
Block.comment: is a bottom of TPC coolant structure

Block.name: BCOV
Block.comment: is a whole TPC cooling channel

Block.name: BWAT
Block.comment: is TPC cooling water

Block.name: BRMD
Block.comment: is a six channel module for TOFr

Module.Block:
DTHgt = (mod7_IGHgt+mod7_SPRMax*2)*(mod7_NGap-1)+mod7_SPRMax*2
XPOS = mod7_Height/2. Y = 0. Z = mod7_Center
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_HCHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_PCBHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_MYHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_GRHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_OGHgt
XPOS = XPOS - DTHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_OGHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_GRHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_MYHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_PCBHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_HCHgt

Block.name: BRHC
Block.comment: is the HoneyComb in the TOFr module

Block.name: BRCB
Block.comment: is the PCB in the TOFr module

Block.name: BRNY
Block.comment: is the MYlar in the TOFr module

Block.name: BRGR
Block.comment: is the GRaphite in the TOFr module

Block.name: BROG
Block.comment: is the Outer Glass in the TOFr module

Block.name: BRDT
Block.comment: is the middle part (including innner glass and gas)in the MRPC

Module.Block:
XPOS = DTHgt/2. Y = 0. Z = 0.
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_SPRMax*2.
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_IGHgt
XPOS = XPOS - mod7_SPRMax*2.

Block.name: BRIG
Block.comment: is the Inner Glass in the TOFr module

Block.name: BRSG
Block.comment: is the sensitive gas layer in the TOFr module

Block.name: BRWG
Block.comment: is the WedGe(support) in the TOFr module

Block.name: GMTS
Block.comment: is the space for the geometry pertaining to the GMT

Block.name: GINO
Block.comment: is the GINO boards

Block.name: GSBB
Block.comment: is the gas seal bonnet base

Block.name: GNSF
Block.comment: is the gas seal flange

Block.name: GSBX
Block.comment: is the gas seal bonnet cover top

Block.name: GSBY
Block.comment: is the gas seal bonnet side

Block.name: GSBZ
Block.comment: is the gas seal bonnet front/back

Block.name: GHVB
Block.comment: is the HV Box

Block.name: GVBC
Block.comment: is the HV Box Connector

Block.name: GFBO
Block.comment: is the Gas Fitting Box

Block.name: GFBC
Block.comment: is the Gas Fitting Box Connector

Block.name: GSBE
Block.comment: is the empty space inside the gas seal bonnet

Block.name: GEMG
Block.comment: is the Argon gas within the GEM

Block.name: GEMS
Block.comment: the GEM

Block.name: GAPV
Block.comment: is the dual APV board
